snippet: The Yankees pitcher Andy Pettitte testified in federal court on Tuesday that Roger Clemens said he had used human growth hormone.
abstract: New York Yankees pitcher Andy Pettitte testifies in federal court that he has used human growth hormone and that Roger Clemens admitted to using the performance-enhancing drug, too; while his testimony is not a surprise, the courtroom scene is one that has been dreaded because it pits two former teammates who had a close relationship against each other.
lead_paragraph: The Yankees pitcher Andy Pettitte testified in federal court on Tuesday that Roger Clemens said he had used human growth hormone.

headline.seo: Andy Pettitte Testifies That Roger Clemens Said He Used H.G.H.
headline.main: In Testimony, Pettitte Says Clemens Spoke of Drug Use
headline.print_headline: In Testimony, Pettitte Says Clemens Spoke Of Drug Use
